transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan boliye. Good morning sir, kaise ho?
Executive: Bahut badhiya. Hello.
Customer: Badhiya sir. Sujit hai bol raha hu.
Executive: Kya?
Executive: Sujit hai bol raha hu.
Customer: Haan haan main Sujit baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan ye aapka number nahi hai, ye toh dusra number hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi mera number aapke paas saved hai, wohi mera number hai. Recorded line se call aayi hai na toh ye number save mat karna aap. Haan mera jo number save hai wohi mera personal number hai, thik hai?
Customer: Achha, thik hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Woh sir aapne meeting ke liye bola tha na sir team ko, isliye maine call kiya aapko ek baar.
Customer: A meeting ke liye abhi toh nahi. Meeting ke liye toh nahi abhi nahi. Ek din ki taraf call aaya tha shayad naam Monica aisa kuch tha unka. Haan haan haan haan. Toh unhone mujhe saamne se call kiya tha toh maine matlab unhone bola ki apne matlab do din bole the. Toh uske baad aapka koi update aaya nahi hai. Sujit bhai ne bhi aapko call kiya tha toh aapne mujhe respond nahi diya aisa mujhe bola gaya tha. Toh maine bola ki mujhe ek dedh din aur de dijiye kyuki jo photographs aur woh sab hai na woh abhi tak mere paas aaya hi nahi hai.
Executive: Haan sir sir main kya hai na sir thoda sa main aapko disturb karunga. Dekho kya hota hai aapke jo profile hai product aap add on kar dijiyega thik hai but products ke names toh pata hai na aapko ki product kya naam se bikta hai. Toh kam se kam aap naam search karke aap buyleads toh connect kar sakte ho na saamne wale se discussion kar sakte ho sir aapki listing down bhi hogi. Thoda sa agar aap comfortable ho toh.
Customer: [inaudible] main aapko bol raha hu mere paas abhi ek brochure aaya hua hai kisi aur company ka hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Toh maine unse mangwa liya tha matlab saamne unka saamne se call aaya tha mere ko kyu aaya tha mujhe pata nahi hai. Toh aap aisa kar sakte ho matlab uske andar thoda edit karke woh sara ka sara brochure ka jo photographs hai woh aap waha pe upload kar sakte ho phir. Totally product.
Executive: Haan bilkul. Aap bhej do main shaam tak karwa dunga sir.
Customer: Aap ek kaam nahi pehle aap kya kijiyega pehle dekh lijiye thik hai. Dekh lene ke baad aap dedh le lene ke baad ye dalne jaisa hai ya nahi dalne jaisa hai aap pehle dekh lijiye uske baad mujhe aap suggest karna ki bhai ye dal sakte hai ya nahi dal sakte hai thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai aap mujhe whatsapp kijiye main dekh kar ke batata hu aapko thik hai.
Customer: Okay okay. Thank you sir okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received photographs for profile.

- Customer received brochure from another company.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share the brochure on WhatsApp.

- Executive will review and suggest if it can be uploaded.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, brochure, photographs, buyleads
